text: “Mee gu mouli i di mouli koia e huaidu gei e hanadu hua i dono hai huaidu. Mee gu hiihai gi nia ada balu ieidu o digau aamua o Babylonia ala e hihi gi di abaaba hale, gaa hunu gi nia mee hunu mmee gono malama, gei e nnoo nadau huaidina gi nia duu nnoo gahu, ga haga ulu nadau libogo gi nadau heelua libogo.
